item.title: Playing CTF Challenges Co-op With Copilot (Part 2)
item.description: Let’s see if we can apply what we learned in the previous article to greater effect… Krypton5: Crack The Vigen√®re Cipher From 3 Intercepted Ciphertexts Let’s play krypton5.

item.title: Playing CTF Challenges Co-op With Copilot
item.description: Github Copilot is at the “Peak of Inflated Expectations” for many, including me. With all the Copilot hype, it’s easy to imagine unicorns assisting programmers in their world of joy!
